overview: It's been thirty years since the brutal murder of Katherine Blakely in her family's home. Now after years of neglect, the Blakely Home is open again, home to seven college students exposing their lives on a new website "TheCampusHouse.com" - But someone doesn't want them there!
tagline: One house, seven students, thirty-three web cams.. you never know who's watching
title: TheCampusHouse.com
